4. Hector Trevino

Hector Trevino
==============

Hector Trevino, Councilor, District 3
-------------------------------------

Term Ends: May 2026  
[Email Hector Trevino](mailto:htrevino@rosenbergtx.gov)  
832-595-3340

Biography
---------

Councilor Trevino was elected to the office of City Councilor, District 3 in a runoff on June 11, 2022, and again on May 4, 2024.  He was appointed as Mayor Pro Tem on July 16, 2024.

Councilor Trevino has been a long-time resident of District 3 in Rosenberg.  Councilor Trevino is married to Erika, and they have three children.  After retiring from the oil and gas industry, Councilor Trevino has started a very successful concrete business.  He is currently in sales.

Service on City Boards & Committees
-----------------------------------

* Finance/Audit Committee
* RDC
* Hotel Occupancy Tax (HOT) Evaluation Committee

![5](https://www.rosenbergtx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=6130 "5")
